page.title: 18Tourism.
page.content: During the winter months there is not alot of tourism,only a few tourists come,mainly from Britain. In the summer there is alot of tourism.Many of the tourists are foregin,Chinese,American and many of the european contries. Many people in the area earn a living thorugh bed and breakfast. The three hotels in Kyleakin,The White Heather,The Kings Arms and the Dunringell,mainly take in people on coach tours of Scotland. There are a few shops in Kyleakin.The Deerstalker is a shop that only opens in the summer. The Filling Station and Camerons are the two main shops.They make lots of money in the tourist season.
